Package reminder

Interface Reminder

All Known Implementing Classes:
QuartzReminder
public interface Reminder
Convenient for using or implementing the code with interface class

Reminder does not store an actual instance of QuartzReminder class, but instead allows you to define an instance of one, through the use of a Reminder.

QuartzReminder have implemented this interfaceReminder for the convenience.

Author:
Nguyen Tuan Ngoc
